channel.title: Martocci Mayhem
channel.description:
Welcome to the home of bite-sized chaos, comedy, and ASMR surprises.
  
New Martocci Mayhem video every single Saturday at noon Eastern time!
 
4–5 Shorts per week, especially on trending or “oddly satisfying” topics.
 
SUBSCRIBE OR I'LL TAKE YOUR GOLDFISH!
